H8315.def: = reddish brown viper with a pale underside and a row of pale blotches arranged side-by-side in pairs all the way down its back; it grows to about 80 centimeters  in length, and its head is smaller and its body thinner than most typical vipers; it is easily provoked and quite aggressive; it is active mainly in the daytime, as it can stand higher temperatures than many other snakes; it lives in desert and grassland areas and feeds on jerboas, mice, and mole rats; its venom is slow-acting but highly poisonous; ◄ |iEchis coloratus|i*; ► unclean animal; ≈ associated with lurking danger

H8434.def: = town, also known as {L:Eltolad<SDBH:אֶלְתֹּולַד>}; ◄ territory of {L:Simeon<SDBH:שִׁמְעֹון>}

H6860.def: = town, precise location unknown; ◄ territory of {L:Simeon<SDBH:שִׁמְעֹון>}; ► belonged to {L:Philistia<SDBH:פְּלֶשֶׁת>} and given to {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>} before he moved to {L:Hebron<SDBH:חֶבְרֹון>} where he was made king of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}

H2702.def: = location, also known as {L:Hazar-Susah<SDBH:חֲצַר סוּסָה>}; ◄ territory of {L:Simeon<SDBH:שִׁמְעֹון>}

H1011.def: = town; ◄ territory of {L:Simeon<SDBH:שִׁמְעֹון>} until reign of king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H8189.def: = town; ◄ located in the {L:foothills<SDBH:שְׁפֵלָה>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}

H428.def: = marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

H5892.def: = relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent {L:villages<SDBH:חָצֵר>}, {L:settlements<SDBH:בַּת>}, and {L:pasturelands<SDBH:מִגְרָשׁ>}; ≈ associated with strength and security

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H4427.def: = state in which humans or deities are in a position of royal authority over a group of people

H2691.def: = collection of dwellings, not surrounded by a wall

H5862.def: = town; ◄ territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; regarded as founded by a man with the same name

H5871.def: = one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices

H7417.def: = town, also known as {L:Rimmon<SDBH:רִמֹּון>}; ► for Levites; ◄ territory of {L:Zebulun<SDBH:זְבוּלוּן>}

H8507.def: = the size or quantity of objects

H2568.def: = state in which a countable entity is five in number

H5892.def: = relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent {L:villages<SDBH:חָצֵר>}, {L:settlements<SDBH:בַּת>}, and {L:pasturelands<SDBH:מִגְרָשׁ>}; ≈ associated with strength and security

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent {L:villages<SDBH:חָצֵר>}, {L:settlements<SDBH:בַּת>}, and {L:pasturelands<SDBH:מִגְרָשׁ>}; ≈ associated with strength and security

H428.def: = marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

H2691.def: = collection of dwellings, not surrounded by a wall

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H1168.def: = person exercising authority over people, animals, or inanimate objects in the role of owner, ruler, or husband

H4186.def: = place where an inanimate object is located, such as the statue of a deity and a town

H3187.def: = process by which someone's name is put in a family register

H3100.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Samuel<SDBH:שְׁמוּאֵל>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► ancestor of {L:Heman<SDBH:הֵימָן>}

H3058.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Jehoshaphat<SDBH:יְהֹושָׁפָט>}, son of {L:Nimshi<SDBH:נִמְשִׁי>}; ► king of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} (c. 841-814)

H438.def: = a large-size tree found either alone or in clumps or forests; ◄ one of the varieties of |iQuercus|i*; ► functioned as landmarks, grave marks or gathering places; since its groves were considered sacred by Canaanites, ritual practices under them was always a temptation to Israelites, denounced in the texts as idolatry; ≈ their characteristics made them suitable symbols of a variety of attributes or attitudes

H428.def: = marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

H8034.def: = one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity

H5387.def: = someone in a position of high authority in a clan, tribe, or nation

H4940.def: = a particular group or class of either people (as in a clan or tribe) or animals (as in a genus or species) that share common characteristics

H1.def: = direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H6555.def: = process by which a container bursts open due to abundance of contents

H1980.def: = process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another

H3996.def: = the act of people coming towards a point of reference and gathering together

H1446.def: = town; ◄ located in the {L:hill country<SDBH:הַר>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; founded by {L:Penuel<SDBH:פְּנוּאֵל>}

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H4217.def: literally: the rising  (of the sun): = a cardinal direction indicating the direction of the rising sun

H1516.def: = a land depression sided or encircled by mountains or elevations

H1245.def: = action by which deities, humans, or animals make an intensive effort to locate (other) humans, animals, objects, or activities, which often requires them to move from one location to another

H4829.def: = open land with enough grass and plants to graze cattle or flocks of sheep and goats

H6629.def: = group of small domestic animals traveling and feeding together; ◄ consisting of sheep and goats; ► hair or wool shorn for weaving into cloth; female milked for food; may be killed and eaten for meat; used as sacrificial animal; ≈ associated with large quantities and also with God's people, who are often seen as a flock with God as their shepherd

H4672.def: = process by which humans or animals discover the person, animal, object or location they were looking for

H8082.def: literally: fatling; hence: = a young animal that has been fattened to prepare it for slaughter, either for food or sacrifice

H4829.def: = open land with enough grass and plants to graze cattle or flocks of sheep and goats

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H7342.def: = state in which an object is large in size

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H8252.def: = state in which an inanimate object does not move

H7961.def: = state in which humans can live without fear or concerns, which is either or not appropriate depending on the situation

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H428.def: = marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

H3789.def: = action by which humans or deities mark letters, words or other symbols on a surface, such as clay, stone, skin, or papyrus, usually with a pointed stylus or reed

H8034.def: = one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H2396.def: = man, also known as {L:Jehizkiah<SDBH:יְחִזְקִיָּה>}; ◄ son of {L:Ahaz<SDBH:אָחָז>}; ► father of {L:Manasseh<SDBH:מְנַשֶּׁה>}; king of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H3063.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}, and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H168.def: = construction ◄ made out of cloth or skins ► used as a temporary residence by nomads, soldiers, shepherds, and even as a sanctuary

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H4672.def: = process by which humans or animals discover the person, animal, object or location they were looking for

glosses: (someone with a) split, disfigured (ear, nose, or lip)
H2763.def: = state in which an object is (partly or entirely) split into two parts

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H4829.def: = open land with enough grass and plants to graze cattle or flocks of sheep and goats

H6629.def: = group of small domestic animals traveling and feeding together; ◄ consisting of sheep and goats; ► hair or wool shorn for weaving into cloth; female milked for food; may be killed and eaten for meat; used as sacrificial animal; ≈ associated with large quantities and also with God's people, who are often seen as a flock with God as their shepherd

H2568.def: = state in which a countable entity is five in number

H3967.def: = state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number

H582.def: = human being; ◄ created by God; ≈ often associated with weakness, fragility, and mortality

H8095.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ second son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H7218.def: = upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities

H5816.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Kohath<SDBH:קְהָת>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► founder of clan of {L:Uzzielites<SDBH:עָזִּיאֵלִי>}

H1980.def: = process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another

H2022.def: = a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a {L:hill<SDBH:גִּבְעָה>}

H8165.def: = man; ► regarded as founder of an ethnic group bearing the same name, and living in an area named after him as well
